name: Batting Simulator
description:
Quick tutorial:  Right Click on mouse to time shot.

W: defense ;   A: cut shot  ;  D: Pull Shot ;  S: straight drive W + A : late cut ; W + D: Sweep Shot 

A  + S : Cover Drive ;  S + D: On drive    Q or E to move batsman

This game is a basic cricket batting simulator with only batsman and bowler. Your goal to set your high score as high as you can. You will get 3 chance. Life will reduce if you don't hit the ball. 

PLEASE CHECK THE CONTROLS OTHERWISE YOUR WHOLE GAME EXPERIENCE WILL BE RUINED

- Press space to start 
- There will be a blue square on the pitch which will indicate where the ball will bounce
- You can move the batsman with Q and E keys for a while after pressing space 
Q for Left and E for Right

- There are 8 shots according to the ball position of bounce you have to press them while you time your shot to hit the ball on that direction

- Batsman will play shot when you will press right click on your mouse * you can only press right click once ;) * 

W A S D are used for determining shot direction.

W: defense ;   A: cut shot  ;  D: Pull Shot ;  S: straight drive

use 2 keys  for diagonal shots

W + A : late cut ; W + D: Sweep Shot

A  + S : Cover Drive ;  S + D: On drive

You can play lofted shot by clicking loft button 

Enjoy :)
